name: The Need for Speed
description: With a confluence of ships from every era, the Ferengi and Slug-O-Cola have seized the opportunity to create another welcome distraction from the pain of the temporal anomaly crisis. Can your sponsored ship win the Lightyear 3000?
rules:
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Faction Missions in one phase, and Supply Missions in another phase.
-- Unique Maquis and Ferengi Traditionalist Faction Missions, as well as Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Torres, G. Burnham, Kim, T. Mayweather, or Pilots will provide a bonus to Faction Missions and Supply Missions.
-- Every Faction or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 2 only. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Torres, G. Burnham, Kim, T. Mayweather, or Pilots
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: DeSoto
featured_crew.flavor: Captain of the USS Hood, DeSoto delivers a sensitive mission and specialist to the “Galaxy boys” aboard the Enterprise.

featured_crew.name: Mayweather
featured_crew.flavor: Inspired by the holodeck adventures of O'Brien and Bashir, Tuskegee Mayweather was released in the Second Battle of New York event.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Mayweather
rewards.flavor: Travis Mayweather was one of the first 'space boomers,' a person born in space.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: DeSoto
rewards.flavor: Captain of the USS Hood, DeSoto delivers a sensitive mission and specialist to the “Galaxy boys” aboard the Enterprise.

adventures.name: Captain's Deck
adventures.description: Secure a front-row seat for the big race.

adventures.name: Crystal Fuel
adventures.description: Obtain enough dilithium to get your ship through the race.

adventures.name: Built to Last
adventures.description: Reinforce your ship's hull with suitable materials.

adventures.name: Entry Vessel
adventures.description: Your chosen ship for the Lightyear 3000.

rewards.name: The Need for Speed
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

rewards.name: Mayweather
rewards.flavor: Inspired by the holodeck adventures of O'Brien and Bashir, Tuskegee Mayweather was released in the Second Battle of New York event.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

screens.text: "'The First Annual Lightyear 3000, Sponsored by Slug-O-Cola: A Race Against Time to Find the Fastest in History.' I wish we had made first contact with the Ferengi in my time. They know how to make the most of a bad situation."

"This could all get fixed tomorrow, which would be wonderful... but when are we going to get the chance to see so many ships from so many eras flying around together again? I'll put the Delta Flyer up against any of them. What about you, Captain? Say you'll join the race!"

"Or, say you're obviously too busy trying to resolve a crisis that's caused untold heartache to millions of people. This is no time for some ridiculous Ferengi cash-in. We all have jobs to do, people depending on us. Time isn't going to fix itself...."

"'The First Annual Lightyear 3000, Sponsored by Slug-O-Cola: A Race Against Time to Find the Fastest in History.' I wish we had made first contact with the Ferengi in my time. They know how to make the most of a bad situation."

"This could all get fixed tomorrow, which would be wonderful... but when are we going to get the chance to see so many ships from so many eras flying around together again? I'll put the Delta Flyer up against any of them. What about you, Captain? Say you'll join the race!"

"Or, say you're obviously too busy trying to resolve a crisis that's caused untold heartache to millions of people. This is no time for some ridiculous Ferengi cash-in. We all have jobs to do, people depending on us. Time isn't going to fix itself...."
"Your ship's really coming along, Captain. I still wouldn't put my latinum on anything other than the Delta Flyer, but it's nice to see she'll have some competition, if only for a few minutes."

responses.text: "We've spent the last four years trying. This might be permanent."
"Morale is just as important as effort--maybe more."
"Gabrielle's right. What's the point, other than lining Ferengi pockets?"

screens.text: "I'm beginning to see why you never made it past ensign, Ensign. So much effort and talent wasted on a stupid race. If you all focused on your jobs instead of distractions, we could end the temporal anomaly crisis."
"You just got to this timeline, Gabrielle. You haven't been living with it for years like we have. People are exhausted. They need something that makes the best of this mess once in a while."

"A lot of people said the Space Race was a silly waste of time and resources. But without it, none of us would be here. Countless scientific breakthroughs wouldn't have happened. They're happening right now, again, because of this race. Please, Captain--see it through."
